Function rerun::external::re_entity_db::external::re_query::range_zip_1x2

source · 
pub fn range_zip_1x2<Idx, IR0, R0, IO0, O0, IO1, O1>(
    r0: IR0,
    o0: IO0,
    o1: IO1
) -> RangeZip1x2<Idx, <IR0 as IntoIterator>::IntoIter, R0, <IO0 as IntoIterator>::IntoIter, O0, <IO1 as IntoIterator>::IntoIter, O1> ⓘ
where
    Idx: Ord,
    IR0: IntoIterator<Item = (Idx, R0)>,
    IO0: IntoIterator<Item = (Idx, O0)>,
    IO1: IntoIterator<Item = (Idx, O1)>,
Expand description

Returns a new RangeZip1x2 iterator.

The number of elements in a range zip iterator corresponds to the number of elements in the shortest of its required iterators (r0).

Each call to next is guaranteed to yield the next value for each required iterator, as well as the most recent index amongst all of them.

Optional iterators accumulate their state and yield their most recent value (if any), each time the required iterators fire.
